Name: Academic paper

Name: Book
Usage: Appropriate for macro roundup posts centered around information derived from books or book chapters.

Name: Government/NGO
Usage: Tag macro roundup posts that draw insights from reports, data, or publications issued by government agencies or non-governmental organizations.

Name: News article
Usage: Reserved for macro roundup posts that rely on news articles from reputable sources as their main references.

Name: Op-Ed/Blogpost
Usage: Apply to macro roundup posts that incorporate opinions, analysis, or insights from opinion pieces, editorials, or blog posts.

Name: Other
